snippet: Korey Kay & Partners, creator of “If you see something, say something,” is being replaced by two agencies: Pulsar Advertising and the Arcade Creative Group.
lead_paragraph: Korey Kay & Partners, creator of “If you see something, say something,” is being replaced by two agencies: Pulsar Advertising and the Arcade Creative Group.

headline.main: The M.T.A. Switches Ad Agencies After 22 Years
headline.print_headline: The M.T.A. Switches Ad Agencies After 22 Years
